to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: ot: frotz interpreter
body:
The following site has interpreters, games, and information for all
sorts of interactive fiction (text games):

http://www.ifarchive.org/

HTH, and have a great day.
